name: Safari 15.2
available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Chijin Zhou of ShuiMuYuLin Ltd and Tsinghua wingtecher lab

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: @18f and @jq0904 of DBAPP Security‘s weibin lab via Tianfu Cup

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Jianjun Dai of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute via Tianfu Cup

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.
